About the data

Our data is updated daily from The COVID Tracking Project, CovidData, & COVID19API

About the site

This project was created by Garrett Haas & Ricky Rhodes to share COVID-19 data as it relates to their lives and areas of interest. The dashboard was created D3.js, Lodash, and Vanilla JS.
